content:
Add a Standard Action

Call a standard invocable action directly from your bot, without referencing it from an Apex class or flow. Use Knowledge actions, custom and standard notification actions, and more.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Einstein Bots is available in Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience. Setup for Einstein Bots is available in Lightning Experience.
Available in: Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions

USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To build and manage Einstein Bots:	
Customize Application

OR

Modify Metadata

OR

Manage Bots

The Standard action dialog step supports standard invocable actions only. It doesnâ€™t support other action types, including custom invocable actions, dynamic actions, quick actions, or button actions.

From the Dialog Component Library, drag the Standard Action step onto the canvas.
In the Step Properties panel, select the standard action you want to use with your bot.
For each input, select or create a bot variable or specify a custom value to pass information into the standard action.
For each output, select or create a bot variable to store the output of the standard action. You can reference the variable in other bot actions, or you can include it in a bot message or question using merge syntax.
Save the dialog.
title: Einstein Bots: Adding Standard Actions
